Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "+keycode is used to determine which locks (exits) a particular key works on, or which keys a particular lock handles. It can also be used to detect invalid settings in locks (for instance the exit pair between two rooms not having the same keycodes).\\r\\n\\r\\nWhenever a new key or exit is +keycode'd, its data is automatically added to the database (Data:DB:Keycodes) to maintain integrity."

"+keycode my keys\\r\\n Retrieve information about every key object in your hands.\\r\\n\\r\\n+keycode east door\\r\\n Retrieve information about the east door in your current environment.\\r\\n\\r\\n(the \\"generate\\" and \\"genrefs\\" functionality is undocumented on purpose, as it should seldom be needed; contact Kalle if you believe it is)"
